MinionCmd¶

MinionCmd is built on top of the built in CMD object. It has two classes, the BossCmd and MinionCmd classes. The main program is an instance of BossCmd, all Tasker plugins can have instances of MinionCmd.

class BossCmd¶

This class is based on the cmd.Cmd object.
